channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jets' Breece Hall breaks free for 59-yard TD, shrinking deficit against Patriots | NFL Highlights
item.description: Breece Hall broke free for 59-yard TD, to shrink the New York Jets' deficit against the New England Patriots.

item.title: USA's Brenden Aaronson Earns Man of the Match in Leeds' 1-1 Draw vs. Sunderland
item.description: United States men's national team forward Brenden Aaronson was Man of the Match for his performance in Leeds United's 1-1 draw against Sunderland in t...

item.title: NFL Contract Incentives Tracker: Sam Darnold, Rico Dowdle Near Massive Paydays
item.description: Here are the contract incentives that NFL players have on the line.

item.title: Colts' Philip Rivers throws 5-yard TD to Mo Alie-Cox to retake lead against Jaguars | NFL Highlights
item.description: Philip Rivers threw a 5-yard TD pass to Mo Alie-Cox that gave the Indianapolis Colts a 17-14 lead against the Jacksonville Jaguars.

item.title: Trey McBride Sets NFL Single-Season Record for Most Receptions by a Tight End
item.description: While the Arizona Cardinals' season has been one to forget, tight end Trey McBride has made NFL history.

item.title: Steelers TE Washington suffers forearm injury
item.description: Steelers tight end Darnell Washington will not return to Sunday's game against the Browns after sustaining a forearm injury in the first half.

item.title: MVPs for every bowl game: Conner Weigman's four TDs help lead Houston to victory
item.description: It's bowl season, and our college football experts are picking an MVP from every game.

item.title: Tkachuk back at Panthers practice after surgery
item.description: Matthew Tkachuk is back on the ice with the Panthers, appearing at practice on Sunday for the first time this season.

item.title: Slumping Lakers hold meeting, eye 'recalibration'
item.description: Lakers coach JJ Redick said Saturday was a day of "recalibration and reconnection" for slumping Los Angeles, which has lost three straight and six of ...

item.title: Whittingham: U-M title quest my 'final challenge'
item.description: Kyle Whittingham said it was a "no-brainer" to take the Michigan job, and he sees a "legitimate" opportunity to win a national title as his "final cha...
